feature: Wide Application: Ideal for OSU game play, digital drawing, sketching, painting and signature in Excel, Word and PDF as well. The tablet is a nice replacement of mouse, allowing to better control the mouse cursor.
Battery Pen with 2048 Pen Pressure: Come with a battery pen P68 with 2 customizable buttons. 2048 pen pressure provides pen-on-paper feeling. Available for right handed and left handed users.
Compact Design Tablet: working area 4-by-2.23 inches, 7.5mm in height and 127g in weight which is portable to carry around.

Wide Application: Ideal for OSU game play, digital drawing, sketching, painting and signature in Excel, Word and PDF as well. The tablet is a nice replacement of mouse, allowing to better control the mouse cursor.
Battery Pen with 2048 Pen Pressure: Come with a battery pen P68 with 2 customizable buttons. 2048 pen pressure provides pen-on-paper feeling. Available for right handed and left handed users.
Compact Design Tablet: working area 4-by-2.23 inches, 7.5mm in height and 127g in weight which is portable to carry around.

OS Compatibility and Drawing Sofware Support: Compatible with Windows 7/8/8.1/10/ and Mac OS 10.8.0 or later version. Can work with major drawing programs like Corel Painter, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator, Comic Studio, SAI and more.
Extra Gifts: 10 extra black pen nibs and 10 extra white pen nibs included. Friendly customer support and 1 Year Warranty.
